title: Integral Calculus and Bessel Function Proofs
desc: A mathematical physics assignment solving integrals using substitutions and Bessel functions, plus proving trigonometric expansions with generating functions.

title: Gravitational Wave Detection and Data Analysis
desc: Explores gravitational wave detection across frequency bands, from CMB polarization to LIGO, and details interferometer response using TT gauge.

title: Gravitational Wave Metric Tensor Calculation
desc: A script calculates gravitational wave metric tensor components in TT gauge for a rotating carbon fiber column source and estimates its critical angular velocity.

title: Feynman Diagrams: A Beginner's Guide
desc: An introductory guide to Feynman diagrams for quantum field theory beginners, covering Dirac equations, free fields, and practical QED calculations with exercises.

title: C++ Programming Basics: Keywords Guide
desc: A comprehensive overview of C++ reserved keywords, covering data types, control flow, functions, memory management, and object-oriented programming concepts.

title: Python Escape Characters Guide
desc: Learn about Python escape characters like \n and \t, their uses in formatting, file paths, and strings, with examples and raw string tips.

title: Advanced Calculus: Taylor's Theorem Review
desc: A concise review of Taylor's Theorem, covering Peano's, Lagrange's, and Cauchy's forms of the remainder term for function approximation.

title: Advanced Calculus Series Convergence Analysis
desc: A technical analysis of six infinite series convergence problems using comparison, ratio, and root tests with detailed proofs.

title: Advanced Calculus Surface and Curve Integrals
desc: Solutions for surface and curve integrals in advanced calculus, including parameterization techniques and Stokes' theorem applications.

title: Power Series Convergence and Summation Formulas
desc: Analyzes convergence domains and summation formulas for power series, including ln(1+x) and arctan expansions, with applications to series like the alternating harmonic series.
